content: Thanks for the company! See you!
info: 日常对话-邀约玩法-退出邀约-1005幻雪_邀约

content: {A笑眯眯}Then... shall we wander around a bit longer? If you have something else to do, just let me know anytime.
info: 日常对话-邀约玩法-退出邀约-1005幻雪_邀约

content: {A灵光一现}Oh? You have something else to take care of?
info: 日常对话-邀约玩法-退出邀约-1005幻雪_邀约

content: {A点头}Alright then... just reach out anytime. I should get back to my books.
info: 日常对话-邀约玩法-退出邀约-1005幻雪_邀约

content: I'd love to keep spending time with you.
info: 日常对话-邀约玩法-退出邀约-1005幻雪_邀约
